backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a trivia quiz backend with a hardcoded question bank, per-player game sessions, score tracking, and a high scores leaderboard using Map and List data structures.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (lobby, game screen, results screen, visual theme) to their corresponding source files, components, and test IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a reference for the purpose and content of each module in the frontend.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including sidebar, chart, and semantic UI tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app titled 'Quiz Planet Co-op', mounting the app at the root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with three routes (lobby, game, results), applying redirect guards on game and results routes when player name params are missing.
frontend/src/components/QuizBanner.tsx: Simple presentational component that renders the quiz banner image with a gold border accent and constrained max height.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (anonymous or authenticated) using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Custom hook and context provider for Internet Identity authentication, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status derived from the DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping all backend actor calls including starting games, fetching questions, answering questions, retrieving scores, checking game completion, and getting high scores.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Google Fonts and Tailwind directives, defines a dark game-show theme using OKLCH CSS variables, and declares reusable component utility classes for game UI elements like cards, buttons, and answer options.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the app with QueryClientProvider for React Query and InternetIdentityProvider for ICP authentication wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/GamePage.tsx: Main game page component that alternates quiz questions between two players, handles answer submission via backend mutations, tracks scores, and navigates to the results page when both players finish.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Lobby page where two players enter their names to start a cooperative quiz game, calling the startNewGame mutation for each player before navigating to the game route.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsPage.tsx: Results page that displays individual and combined team scores after both players finish, shows a performance message based on percentage correct, and renders a high scores leaderboard.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration that maps all design tokens to OKLCH CSS variables (including game-specific colors like gold, player1, player2), extends fonts with Nunito and Bebas Neue, and registers typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project state for 'Quiz Planet Co-op', a two-player cooperative quiz game, including existing frontend features (lobby, game, results screens, visual theme) and a pending backend feature to store a question bank and track game sessions.
